title: Track circuit fault causing delays on East West Line

updates.text: [EWL]UPDATE:Congestion from #Redhill to #Dover has cleared. Normal service has resumed.
[EWL]UPDATE: Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 5mins travel time from #Redhill to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE: Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 10mins travel time from #Redhill to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE: Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 10mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL] UPDATE:  Pls cater 10 mins additional travel time from #CityHall to #Dover.We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 10 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 10 mins additional travel time from #CityHall to #Dover.We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 15 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 20 mins additional travel time from #CityHall to #Dover.We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista,pls add 20 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,train svc is still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 25 mins additional travel time from #CityHall to #Dover.We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 25 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista.Train svc is still available.
[EWL] UPDATE: Pls cater 25 mins additional travel time from #CityHall to #Dover. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 25 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista. Train svc is still available.
[EWL]UPDATE:Pls add 15 mins travel time from #CityHall to #Dover,due to a track circuit fault at #BuonaVista. Train svc is still available.
